1.0.name: wordpress/facebook-i-like-button
1.0.description:
Facebook introduced the 'Like' button, which can be easily placed on the webpages. If the visitor of the webpage clicks on the button, it is visible on the page itself and also on user's Facebook wall as short notice. This is ment to bring more visitors to the webpage as Facebook friends of the visitor get noticed about the page.

Future plans: - possibility to override Like button settings for specific posts / pages (do not display Like button on the post/page at all, change the settings for the post/page) - Like button in a form of widget
